comments.body: This change is to work around the dependent PR: #30825.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +49,53 @@      val newRelation = DataSourceV2Relation.create(tbl, Some(catalog), Some(newIdent))
      cacheTable(
        Dataset.ofRows(sqlContext.sparkSession, newRelation),
        Some(newIdent.quoted),
        oldStorageLevel)
